handNote.p: Ker's hand 2: e sometimes high in æ; head of long s prolonged and looped; ð is frequent; descenders are seriffed.
A reviser of s. xii who adds a final "e" on erasure; r Caroline.
A hand of s. xi2 who adds marginal "foh" on 229v and inserts "ure" two times; e with diagonal tongue.
